entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
